    • 方法详细资料

      • calCommission

        public void calCommission(Context<?> respCtx,
                 java.lang.Object operatorOrMerchant)
                   throws ApplicationException
        Calculate the commission of transaction. Below will give a sample to explain the logic, and before that we assume there is a 4-level operator/merchant hierarchy.

        Level Name CreditType
        #1 Distributor#1 Definite Value
        #2 Merchant#2 Definite Value
        #3 Merchant#2A Definite Value
        #4 Operator#2A1 Definite Value

        Now if operator#2A1 sold a ticket with amount $100 and the commission rate is 1%,

        Definite Operator

        If the credit type of operator#2A1 is 'definite value', TE will generate only a single balance log as below,
        TE_Trans_ID Owner_ID Trans_Amount Commission_Amount
        Sale_Trans_ID Operator#2A1 100 1
        Be noted that the Owner_ID is the node who get the commission.

        Besides TE will deduct the sale balance of 'operator#2A1' by $100 as well and topup commission balance of 'operator#2A1' by $1. DataConsumer will care the commission of all parent nodes of 'operator#2A1'.

        Operator Use Parent

        If the credit type of both 'operator#2A1' and 'merchant#2A' is 'use parent', that says the sale will only affect the sale balance of 'merchant#2'. In this case TE will generate 2 balance logs for 'operator#2A1' and 'merchant#2', and it will only calculate commission for 'operator#2A1', DataConsumer will care the commission of all parent nodes of 'operator#2A1'.
        TE_Trans_ID Owner_ID Trans_Amount Commission_Amount
        Sale_Trans_ID Operator#2A1 100 1
        Sale_Trans_ID Merchant#2 100 null(dataConsumer will calculate it)

        TE will deduct the sale balance of 'merchant#2' by $100 as well, and doesn't need to maintain the commission balance of 'operator#2A1', as it is 'use parent'.

        指定者:
        calCommission 在接口中 CommissionBalanceService
        参数:
        respCtx - The transaction context. The following components must be set: respCtx.transaction.operatorId,respCtx.transaction.merchantId,respCtx.transaction.gameId
        operatorOrMerchant - THe operator or merchant(use parent) on which the balance is done.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - If encounter any business exception.

      • cancelCommission

        public void cancelCommission(Context<?> respCtx,
                    Transaction targetTrans,
                    java.lang.Object operatorOrMerchant)
                      throws ApplicationException
        Reverse the commission calculation. This service will
        1. Mark all balance logs of original transaction(such as sale, payout etc) as 'invalid'.
        2. Restore the commission balance of operator if its credit type is 'definite value'.
        3. Generate cancellation balance log for operator and parent if operator's credit-type is 'use parent'(follow the same rule as calCommission(Context, Object).
        指定者:
        cancelCommission 在接口中 CommissionBalanceService
        参数:
        respCtx - The transaction context.
        targetTrans - The transaction which is cancelled.
        operatorOrMerchant - THe operator or merchant(use parent) on which the balance is done.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - If encounter any business exception.

      • determineCommUnits

        protected abstract java.util.List<CommissionUnit> determineCommUnits(Transaction transaction)
                                                              throws ApplicationException
        Sub-implementation class should implement this method to determine the CommissionUnits. For some transaction, such as 'IG batch validation', multiple CommissionUnit should be returned, as it may involve multiple games, and each game will be assigned different commission rate.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
